messages.subject: Re: Santa Cruz again
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Nanci, Small world.  I live in Boulder Creek.  I, too, spent time here as a teenager, but that was a zillion years ago.......I ve come to find out over the
messages.messageBody:
Hi Nanci,
Small world. I live in Boulder Creek. I, too, spent time here as a
teenager, but that was a zillion years ago.......I've come to find out over
the 12 years we've owned a home here, that many have youthful ties to this
area.
Hmmm, there is no Scotts Valley High........not yet at least.
They've been working on the politics of getting a h.s. built there for years
but the kids in this area go to San Lorenzo High; Scotts Valley kids go to
Santa Cruz.
Gosh, I wonder if I know your friend. A couple of our really close
friends are postal employees in Soquel. Thanks for the email.
Judy in CA


In a message dated 6/2/99 3:45:21 PM Pacific Daylight Time,

messages.subject: Re: Santa Cruz again
messages.msgSnippet: ... from ... Hi Judy, Santa Cruz Mountains huh?  I grew up in San Francisco, and when my best friend (who lived in Menlo Park) moved to Boulder Creek I started
messages.messageBody:
At 06:33 PM 6/2/99 EDT, you wrote:
>From: JandJBC@...
>
>Hi Shannon,
> That was me who thought I was the only one from CA, but as I said,
>I've been flying through all of the bios here. Glad to see someone else
from
>the Golden State. What part of No. CA are you in? And, do I know you from
>the CAHomeschool list? I'm in the Santa Cruz Mountains myself.
>Judy in CA


Hi Judy,

Santa Cruz Mountains huh? I grew up in San Francisco, and when my best
friend (who lived in Menlo Park) moved to Boulder Creek I started spending
a lot of time up there in BC, Ben Lomond (sp?) and the surrounding area. I
had friends of my own up there before long. The kids all went to Scotts
Valley high, and some of them lived on a commune up in BL with their
parents. My friend still lives in the area, though we have drifted apart.
I believe she is one of the local mail carriers!

Nanci K.
